docs.text: JHead Arreglar rápidamente las fechas de las fotos con jhead Estándar A veces nos encontramos con unas cuantas fotos que tienen la fecha mal puesta. Suele pasar con fotos que no son nuestras, y cuyo propietario no controla mucho y no sabe ni que la cámara tiene hora, no se ha acordado de poner en hora la cámara al cambiar la batería, o cosas así. La solución “estándar” sería importar las fotos a nuestro programa de gestión de fotos favoritos, y retocarlas allí, pero a veces esa no es la mejor opción, y puede ser más fácil arreglar el problema antes de hacer la importación. Buscando un programita para estas tareas sencillas, me he encontrado con jhead. Es una utilidad de línea de comandos, sí, pero su uso es muy sencillo y extremadamente rápido para ciertas tareas repetitivas. Por ejemplo, el típico caso de una cámara que tenía la hora mal puesta lo solucionaríamos con algo así como: jhead -ta+01:30 *.jpg Así le decimos que nos sume 1h30 a todas las fotos. ¿Que no queremos hacer números? No hay problema, también podemos indicarle la fecha “buena” y la “mala”, y él calcula la diferencia: jhead -da2014:12:16/13:24-2009:06:06/12:20 *.jpg También permite cosas más sutiles. Por ejemplo, a veces tenemos un montón de fotos mezcladas de diferentes cámaras, pero sólo una de las cámaras tiene la fecha mal puesta. No hay problema, podemos decirle que sólo actúe sobre las fotos de una cámara en concreto: jhead -model “FinePix S6500fd” -ta+02.37 *.jpg O puede que los ficheros no tengan información EXIF porque la cámara es viejuna y no soportaba estas filigranas, pero la fecha de modificación de los ficheros en el sistema de ficheros sí es correcta y queremos incorporarla como fecha EXIF: jhead -mkexif -dsft *.jpg En fin, que se pueden hacer muchas cosas de forma muy fácil y rápida. Además, jhead está en todos los repositorios, por lo que la instalación es sencillísima. En definitiva, todo un descubrimiento que nos puede ahorrar tiempo y esfuerzo.
docs.title: JHead

docs.text: Convertir texto a audio en Gentoo Con este script conseguimos escuchar el texto que tenemos en el portapapeles Agregamos la variable use de mbrola de nuestro idioma en el fichero /etc/portage/make.conf y agregamos la línea: L10N="es" Instalamos los programas necesarios emerge -va espeak mbrola soundconverter Buscamos las voces instaladas para speak espeak --voices=variant #!/bin/bash # script para copiar lo que hay en el clipboard a un fichero y escucharlo FICHERO=/tmp/temp.txt # pasarmos el portapapeles a un fichero de texto xsel --clipboard > $FICHERO #convertimos el fichero de texto introducido como parámetro a audio wav espeak -v mb-es2 -p 99 -s 150 -f $FICHERO -w $FICHERO.wav #espeak -v mb-es1 -p 99 -s 200 -f $FICHERO -w $FICHERO.wav #espeak -v mb-us2 -p 99 -s 140 -f $1 -w $1.wav # convertimos el wav a ogg y eliminamos el wav (media-sound/vorbis-tools) oggenc $FICHERO.wav -b 32 rm $FICHERO.wav # reproducimos el archivo ogg #ogg123 $1.ogg audacious $FICHERO.ogg &
docs.title: Convertir texto a audio en Gentoo

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=709F2_wee9k) Crear cristal (Cycles - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=709F2_wee9k) Crear cristal (Cycles - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=709F2_wee9k) Cámara Compositing Varios Crear espejo Renderización desde Google Colab Pendiente de comprobar Bibliografía Cursos e iniciación Creación de personajes Físicas Específicos Boolean Curvas Materiales / nodos Geometry Nodes Sanctus Python UVs Addons Recursos Enlaces de interés Varios Comercio Image to 3D Para revisar Enlaces de Blender España (Telegram) Atajos de teclado varios F3 => Ayuda para encontrar acciones Q ( Quick Favorites ) => Para guardar en favoritos Crtl + space = Expande vista y oculta x => Eliminar objetos, aritas, vértices, etc. h => Ocultar // Alt + h => Eliminar ocultación Shift + r => Repetición de la última acción Para movernos dentro de la vista Botón rueda => para movernos Shift + Botón rueda => Panea Los botones del teclado numérico: 1 => Frontal Ctrl + 1 => Frontal trasero 5 => Frontal perspectiva 3 => Lateral Ctrl + 3 => Lateral trasero 7 => Vista superior Ctrl + 7 => Vista superior invertido 9 => Invertir la vista en la que estás 2 y 8 => Girar verticalmente 4 y 6 => Girar horizontalmente Mover + Shift => más precisión Mover + Ctrl => snap a otros objetos Origin (Median point), cursor 3D y flechas de coordenadas Con el menú Transform Pivot Point permite elegir el punto de pivote para tus transformaciones. El punto de pivote es el punto alrededor del cual se rotarán, escalarán o moverán tus objetos. * Shift + c => Centrar el cursor 3D en el objeto * Crtl + . => Se activa la modificación del punto de origen * Botón derecho sobre el objeto + Set origin + => Mueve el centro origen del objeto donde queramos * Shift + s => Menú Snap * Menú Object > Set Origin => Modificación del 'Origin' del objeto. * Shift + click derecho => Mueve el cursor donde queramos * Para tener en cuenta el cursor para las transformaciones podemos ir al Menú Transform Pivot Point > 3D cursor * Panel n donde podemos mover el cursor * Barra espaciadora => Muestra las flechas de coordenadas para las transformaciones. * . (NO teclado numérico) => Menú de punto de pivote Cambios de vista Seleccionamos objeto + View > Frame selected => Nos centra la vista en el objeto seleccionado. También el . del teclado numérico / (teclado numérico) => Nos centra en el objeto y oculta todo lo demás z => Sale el menú de vista Numpad . => Nos centra en el objeto seleccionado Transformar objetos Cuando pulsamos Shift + x | y | z , la transformación afecta a las otras 2 coordenadas que no son la que se ha pulsado. Herramienta mover objeto g => Movimiento en todas direcciones g + x | y | z => Limita al eje g + rueda central => Limita a los ejes Alt + g => Resetea la localización del objeto y lo lleva al centro de "World" Herramienta de Rotar objeto r => Movimiento en todas direcciones r + x | y | z => Limita al eje r + rueda central => Limita a los ejes Escalar objeto s => Movimiento en todas direcciones s + x | y | z => Limita al eje s + rueda central => Limita a los ejes Alt + r => Resetea la rotación que se haya hecho en el objeto Herramienta de Rotar objeto Aplicar transformaciones de objeto Alt + r => Resetear rotaciones de un objeto Alt + g => Resetear localización de un objeto Alt + s => Resetear escala de un objeto Duplicar y rotar en un eje (instancia de objeto) En modo objeto Movemos el objeto donde queremos Alt + d para duplicarlo y cancelamos el movimiento Pulsamos s para escalar, pulsamos x , y o z para fijar el eje y luego pulsamos -1 Esto reflejará y hará un espejo del objeto duplicado en el eje seleccionado Menú Snap ( Shift + s ) Con estas herramientas, puedes alinear, posicionar y mover elementos de manera precisa Conjunto de objetos Herencia de objetos Se hace click primero en el objeto que quieres que sea el padre y luego se selecciona el resto. Luego pulsamos el menú Objet > Parent > Object ( Crtl + p ) y cuando transformemos el padre se transformarán también los hijos, pero no al revé. Para deshacer Objet > Parent > Clar and Keep tronsformation Fusionar objetos Click derecho + join / Ctrl + j Agrupar objetos Selección de objetos + botón derecho + m => Se añade a una nueva colección. Crear objetos Shift + d => Duplicar objetos Si se pulsa Esc después de duplicar deja el objeto el el mismo sitio que el original. Shift + a => Menú de creación de objetos Edit mode Tab => Cambiamos entre Edit mode y Object mode f => Rellenar k => knife. Cuchillo para recortar con líneas bezier Ctrl + f => Menú contextual de caras Selecciones a => Seleccionar todo a + a => Deseleccionar todo Alt + a => Deseleccionar todo Los objetos que creamos dentro del Object mode se añaden al objeto que tenemos seleccionado y es como uno solo. 1 => Selección de vértice 2 => Selección de arista 3 => Selección de cara Numpad . => Nos centra en el objeto seleccionado b => Caja de selección Selección de todo un objeto => Seleccionamos una parte de un obejto y + L Seleccionar todas las aristas contiguas (Loop) => Shift + Alt + Click Seleccionar todas las aristas paraleas (anillo) => Ctrl + Alt + Click Crtl + i => Invertir selección Crtl + + => Aumenta la selección a las caras adyacentes a la selección activa. Selección "camino más corto" Seleccionamos el primer elemento Pulsamos Crtl + click y seleccionará todo lo que hay por enmedio en las 2 selecciones Modificadores F9 => Datos de la última acción que hayamos hecho a => Selecciona todo e => Extruir Shif + e => "Extrude Along Normals" => Esto significa que cada elemento se moverá en su propia dirección normal sin afectar a los demás. s => Escalar Alt + s => "Scale Along Normals" (Escalar a lo largo de las normales) o "Shrink/Fatten" (Encoger/Agrandar). Esta acción permite escalar una selección de vértices, aristas o caras a lo largo de sus normales individuales. i => Insertar caras en la cara seleccionada (Inset). Pulsando Ctrl movemos la subdivisión creada i + i => Hace Inset en todas las caras seleccionadas individualmente Ctrl + b => Bevel Seleccionar una región entre 2 loops (anillos de aristas) : Seleccionamos un loop con Alt + Shift + click y luego otro click en el segundo loop Menu Select > Select Loop > Select Loop Inner Region Alt + b => "Clipping Border" : Todo lo que se encuentre fuera de esa región no se mostrará ni se renderizará. Ctrl + num => Crea el modificador Subdividir Botón derecho + Subdivide Herramienta Loop Cut => Subdivide la pieza en 2. Si pinchas y arrastras con el ratón pones la división donde quieras. Borrar y rellenar Para hacer un agujero correcto en una pieza, seleccionamos las caras de ambos lados que queremos agujerear, pulsamos botón derecho + Birdge Faces Seleccionamos las caras o aristas colindantes y pulsamos f Fusionar vértices m => Fusiono vértices => Selecciono > Menú Mesh > Merge ( m ) Alt + m => Split vertice => Separo un vértice en varios Suavizado Llave fija + Subdivision Surface Botón derecho + Shade Smooth Botón derecho + Shade Smooth + Object Data Properties > Normals > Auto Smooth Barra derecha de opciones > Object Data Properties > Normals > Auto Smooth Y después menú Object > Shade Auto Smooth Diferencias de objetos (Boolean) Shift + - Seleccionamos el objeto principal > Modifier Properties > Boolean > Seleccionar el objeto cotador Object Properties > Viewport Display > Display AS > Elegir cómo queremos verlo Knife Project Seleccionamos el objeto objetivo en Object Mode Pulsamos tab para entrar en el Edit mode Pulsamos Ctrl y hacemos click en el objeto cortador Menú Mesh > Knife Project Materiales Materiales procedurales Textrure Coordenate Generated => Va desde los valores 0 a 1 X: 0 en la parte más a la izquierda del objeto y 1 en la parte más a la derecha del objeto Y: 0 en la parte más inferior del objeto y 1 en la parte mas superior del objeto (vista superior) Z: 0 en la parte más abajo y 1 en la parte más arriba del objeto Object => El 0 está en el origen del objeto o en un objeto seleccionado X: 1 a la derecha y -1 a la izquierda Y: 1 superior y -1 inferior Z: 1 en la parte arriba y -1 en la abajo Node Wrangler Hay que activar el Addon Node Wrangler Ctrl + t => Genera nodos necesarios * Ctrl + 0 => Conecta 2 nodos, creando un mixer o como se tenga que hacer. * f => Conecta 2 nodos * Ctrl + j => Junta varios nodos para agruparlos * Shift + Ctrl + Click en un nodo => Nos muestra directamente en la salida la información y lo que está haciendo ese nodo. docs.text: F3 => Ayuda para encontrar acciones Q ( Quick Favorites ) => Para guardar en favoritos Crtl + space = Expande vista y oculta x => Eliminar objetos, aritas, vértices, etc. h => Ocultar // Alt + h => Eliminar ocultación Shift + r => Repetición de la última acción
docs.title: Atajos de teclado varios

docs.text: Botón rueda => para movernos Shift + Botón rueda => Panea Los botones del teclado numérico: 1 => Frontal Ctrl + 1 => Frontal trasero 5 => Frontal perspectiva 3 => Lateral Ctrl + 3 => Lateral trasero 7 => Vista superior Ctrl + 7 => Vista superior invertido 9 => Invertir la vista en la que estás 2 y 8 => Girar verticalmente 4 y 6 => Girar horizontalmente Mover + Shift => más precisión Mover + Ctrl => snap a otros objetos
docs.title: Para movernos dentro de la vista

docs.text: Con el menú Transform Pivot Point permite elegir el punto de pivote para tus transformaciones. El punto de pivote es el punto alrededor del cual se rotarán, escalarán o moverán tus objetos. * Shift + c => Centrar el cursor 3D en el objeto * Crtl + . => Se activa la modificación del punto de origen * Botón derecho sobre el objeto + Set origin + => Mueve el centro origen del objeto donde queramos * Shift + s => Menú Snap * Menú Object > Set Origin => Modificación del 'Origin' del objeto. * Shift + click derecho => Mueve el cursor donde queramos * Para tener en cuenta el cursor para las transformaciones podemos ir al Menú Transform Pivot Point > 3D cursor * Panel n donde podemos mover el cursor * Barra espaciadora => Muestra las flechas de coordenadas para las transformaciones. * . (NO teclado numérico) => Menú de punto de pivote
docs.title: Origin (Median point), cursor 3D y flechas de coordenadas

docs.text: Seleccionamos objeto + View > Frame selected => Nos centra la vista en el objeto seleccionado. También el . del teclado numérico / (teclado numérico) => Nos centra en el objeto y oculta todo lo demás z => Sale el menú de vista Numpad . => Nos centra en el objeto seleccionado
docs.title: Cambios de vista

docs.text: Cuando pulsamos Shift + x | y | z , la transformación afecta a las otras 2 coordenadas que no son la que se ha pulsado.
docs.title: Transformar objetos

docs.text: g => Movimiento en todas direcciones g + x | y | z => Limita al eje g + rueda central => Limita a los ejes Alt + g => Resetea la localización del objeto y lo lleva al centro de "World"
docs.title: Herramienta mover objeto

docs.text: r => Movimiento en todas direcciones r + x | y | z => Limita al eje r + rueda central => Limita a los ejes
docs.title: Herramienta de Rotar objeto

docs.text: s => Movimiento en todas direcciones s + x | y | z => Limita al eje s + rueda central => Limita a los ejes Alt + r => Resetea la rotación que se haya hecho en el objeto
docs.title: Escalar objeto

docs.text: Alt + r => Resetear rotaciones de un objeto Alt + g => Resetear localización de un objeto Alt + s => Resetear escala de un objeto
docs.title: Aplicar transformaciones de objeto

docs.text: En modo objeto Movemos el objeto donde queremos Alt + d para duplicarlo y cancelamos el movimiento Pulsamos s para escalar, pulsamos x , y o z para fijar el eje y luego pulsamos -1 Esto reflejará y hará un espejo del objeto duplicado en el eje seleccionado
docs.title: Duplicar y rotar en un eje (instancia de objeto)

docs.text: Con estas herramientas, puedes alinear, posicionar y mover elementos de manera precisa
docs.title: Menú Snap (Shift + s)

docs.text: Se hace click primero en el objeto que quieres que sea el padre y luego se selecciona el resto. Luego pulsamos el menú Objet > Parent > Object ( Crtl + p ) y cuando transformemos el padre se transformarán también los hijos, pero no al revé. Para deshacer Objet > Parent > Clar and Keep tronsformation
docs.title: Herencia de objetos

docs.text: Click derecho + join / Ctrl + j
docs.title: Fusionar objetos

docs.text: Selección de objetos + botón derecho + m => Se añade a una nueva colección.
docs.title: Agrupar objetos

docs.text: Shift + d => Duplicar objetos Si se pulsa Esc después de duplicar deja el objeto el el mismo sitio que el original. Shift + a => Menú de creación de objetos
docs.title: Crear objetos

docs.text: Tab => Cambiamos entre Edit mode y Object mode f => Rellenar k => knife. Cuchillo para recortar con líneas bezier Ctrl + f => Menú contextual de caras
docs.title: Edit mode

docs.text: a => Seleccionar todo a + a => Deseleccionar todo Alt + a => Deseleccionar todo Los objetos que creamos dentro del Object mode se añaden al objeto que tenemos seleccionado y es como uno solo. 1 => Selección de vértice 2 => Selección de arista 3 => Selección de cara Numpad . => Nos centra en el objeto seleccionado b => Caja de selección Selección de todo un objeto => Seleccionamos una parte de un obejto y + L Seleccionar todas las aristas contiguas (Loop) => Shift + Alt + Click Seleccionar todas las aristas paraleas (anillo) => Ctrl + Alt + Click Crtl + i => Invertir selección Crtl + + => Aumenta la selección a las caras adyacentes a la selección activa.
docs.title: Selecciones

docs.text: Seleccionamos el primer elemento Pulsamos Crtl + click y seleccionará todo lo que hay por enmedio en las 2 selecciones
docs.title: Selección "camino más corto"

docs.text: F9 => Datos de la última acción que hayamos hecho a => Selecciona todo e => Extruir Shif + e => "Extrude Along Normals" => Esto significa que cada elemento se moverá en su propia dirección normal sin afectar a los demás. s => Escalar Alt + s => "Scale Along Normals" (Escalar a lo largo de las normales) o "Shrink/Fatten" (Encoger/Agrandar). Esta acción permite escalar una selección de vértices, aristas o caras a lo largo de sus normales individuales. i => Insertar caras en la cara seleccionada (Inset). Pulsando Ctrl movemos la subdivisión creada i + i => Hace Inset en todas las caras seleccionadas individualmente Ctrl + b => Bevel Seleccionar una región entre 2 loops (anillos de aristas) : Seleccionamos un loop con Alt + Shift + click y luego otro click en el segundo loop Menu Select > Select Loop > Select Loop Inner Region Alt + b => "Clipping Border" : Todo lo que se encuentre fuera de esa región no se mostrará ni se renderizará. Ctrl + num => Crea el modificador
docs.title: Modificadores

docs.text: Botón derecho + Subdivide Herramienta Loop Cut => Subdivide la pieza en 2. Si pinchas y arrastras con el ratón pones la división donde quieras.

docs.text: A curated list of awesome Blender add-ons, tools, tutorials and resources for 3D Artists, Hobbyists, Developers, Researchers. Focused mostly open source and free resources. Contents: | 🔮Add-ons | 🪐Resources | 📥Standalone | 🔍Explore Blender | 👩🏻‍🏫Tutorials | 👩🏽‍💻Development | 🖇Social | Show Detailed Table: 🔮Add-ons 🌊Simulation/Physics 🦑Generator/Builder 🧊Modeling 🌠Animation 🗜Render Engine 🗺️Texture/UV 🎮GameDev 🪀Misc 🪐Resources 🎠3D Models 🤸🏾‍♀️Mocap/Animation 🌑Textures 🌓Blender Materials 🌲Blender Scenes/Files ⛅HDRIs 🖼️Art/Reference 🛰Space 🎧Sound/Music 🏞Free Stocks 🌂Useful 📥Standalone Blender Builds 3D Tools Various Tools Photogrammetry Texture/Material Terrain Real-World Height Maps Point Cloud/LiDAR Data Generator AI-Powered Sound/Music Painting 🔍Explore Blender Documantation Developement Community 👩🏻‍🏫Tutorials 🍩Beginning 🗿Modeling 🌌Geometry Nodes 🔘Shader Nodes 🌠Animation 🔲UV Mapping 🔳Texture Painting 📐Compositing 🤺Motion Tracking/Capture Premium Tutorials Fundamentals 📚Books 👩🏽‍💻Development Scripting/Developing Blender Source Learn Python Learn Computer Graphics Related Awesome Lists 🖇Social 🔍Explore Artworks 🐦Twitter Accounts 📢Youtube Channels 💻Blogs 🎊Challenges 🎉Events Symbols Contributing 🔮Add-ons ^ Check list of Blender's built-in add-ons documentation here . 🌊Simulation/Physics ^ FLIP Fluids : is a powerful liquid simulation plugin that gives you the ability to create high quality fluid effects all within Blender, the free and open source 3D creation suite. Molecular Script : is a particle collision addon that makes particles collide for creating certain types of simulations, effects and particles linking as well. Jet-Fluids : Jet fluid simulator integration in blender. projectile : An artist-friendly tool for throwing stuff around inside blender. Phobos : An add-on for Blender allowing to create URDF, SDF and SMURF robot models. 🦑Generator/Builder ^ CharMorph : is an open source character creation tool for Blender. It's a rewrite of MB-Lab , which is now unmaintained. MPFB : MPFB2 is an open source human generator for Blender. It's complete rewrite of MakeHuman as a Blender addon. FaceBuilder [$] : is a Blender add-on that lets you create photorealistic 3D models of human faces and heads using a few photographs with a neutral face expression. [medium] Tiny Eye : Tiny Eye is a FREE, fully procedural, stylised eye that works in Eevee and Cycles. Wolf Generators : a pack of 16 geometry nodes generators, including Bridge, Cables, Chain, Falling Particles, Lightning, Music Visualizer, Rope, Snow, Snow Flake, Spider Web. Buildify : is a geometry nodes library for easy building creation. Bricker [$] : Photoreal Lego/Minecraft Simulations. Blender Data Visualisation : Load data into Blender and create visualisations. BookGen : is a free book-generation addon for Blender. Celtic Knot : Generate bezier curves, pipes and ribbons in elaborate weavings, based off of a framework mesh. Data-FX : Loads and visualizes different types of data within Blender from .csv files. Electric Line Generator : is an addon for blender which helps generating complex Electric power Line. Geometry Nodes Demo : Free examples of geometry nodes including procedural buildings and a hex grid map. Geometry Nodes Pipes : is an addon for blender which helps generating complex pipe layouts. HGen : Blender hair generation and manipulating tool. Industrial Geonodes : A collection of industrial themed Geometry nodes. Includes; Pipes, Vents and Catwalks. Mesh Maze : Blender add-on to generate a maze on any mesh. Modular Tree : This addon for blender allows the creation of realistic trees with the node editor. Post USSR Builder : Simple post USSR style building generator on geometry nodes. 2.93 and newer. Procedural Snow Shader : Procedural snow shader created in Blender. Procedural Slime : generates procedural slime between objects. Random Book Generator : Book randomizing asset for Blender. Made with the new Geometry nodes. Real Sky : This add-on can generate procedural clouds, which Blender's built-in Dynamic Sky add-on lacks. SpaceshipGenerator : procedurally generate 3D spaceships. Space Station Generator : Tool lets you generate sprawling space stations. Sprytile : a blender add-on for building tile based low-poly scenes with paint/map editor like tools. [more info] Stylized Fantasy Tree Generator : Generate endless variations of stylized trees with this geometry nodes tool. tree-gen : procedural generation of tree models in blender. Tyre Generator : Free tyre generator with geometry nodes. Welder : welds generator for Blender. Environment: Infinigen : Infinigen is a procedural generator of 3D scenes. It can generate infinite Photorealistic Worlds using real geometry. Infinigen is optimized for computer vision research and generates diverse high-quality 3D training data. Graswald [$] : is the solution for 3D Artists who need realistic vegetation in their scenes. SceneCity [$] : Generate large road networks and mass-place tens of thousands of buildings. Mix both procedural and hand-made assets. The Grove 3D [$] : Grow natural 3D trees for visualisation and film. Grow, bend, prune, interactively simulate the seasons year by year. Scatter: Geo-Scatter [$] : The scattering tool for blender. BagaPie Modifier : This addon create modifier and geometry nodes preset like: boolean, scatter, auto array on curve. Gscatter : Artist-friendly scattering for free from developers of Grasswald. City Scatter : Generate cityscape concepts, powered by Blender's collection system. 🧊Modeling ^ MACHIN3tools : is a free, continuously evolving collection of blender tools and pie menus in a single customizable package. QBlocker : is an interactive object creation tool for Blender. fspy : is an open-source camera matching app, extremely useful for modeling directly from a reference image. (blender addon) PolyQuilt : is provides a few functions in edit mode like creating faces, knife tool, fan, edge-loops, etc. It does this with only the left-mouse-button. So no menu’s, no shortcuts. [more info] Modeling Cloth : Create real-time cloth-like behavior in meshes in Blender. KeKit : Brings some much needed functionality to Blender, with a whole array of production tools. Array Tools : is an addon for Blender to create translation, scale, rotation array with offset or global parameters in any direction and mix them. BezierUtility : This add-on contains several tools for working with Bezier curves. Mesh Heal : is an add-on for Blender, it includes additional Blender operators for healing surface meshes. JewelCraft : jewelry design toolkit add-on for Blender. Box Select X-Ray : Modified box select tool that automatically toggles x-ray mode on and off during selection. Polysweeper : is a tool to sweep a face profile along a face loop. Edit Split Normals : Edit normals like meshes. Auto Mirror : Automate a series of tasks, such as deleting a half, setting a mirror modifier, setting a clipping, etc. Drop It : Designed to drop fast and simply Objects to Ground or Surface. Maxivz’s Interactive Tools : Collection of intuitive, context sensitive tools for Blender. Synced Modifiers : allows you to add modifiers to multiple objects at the same time and automatically syncs all the modifiers using Drivers. CAD: BlenderBIM : An add-on for beautiful, detailed, and data-rich OpenBIM with Blender. Archipack [$] : The Archipack addon for Blender contains a collection of parametric primitives for ArchViz. You can manipulate these primitives with a realtime on-screen editing interface. Building Tools : Building generation addon for blender. Sverchok : is a powerful parametric tool for architects, allowing geometry to be programmed visually with nodes. CAD Sketcher : CAD Sketcher is a free and open-source project looking to enhance precision workflows in blender by bringing CAD like tools, features and usability. CAD Transform : CAD Transform provide intuitive snap from/to workflow, allow precise move/rotate/scale using advanced snap options and constraints in both object and edit mode. MeasureIt-ARCH : An expansion of Antonio Vazquez's MeasureIt addon to add features to create Architectural Drawings. JARCH-Vis : is add-on for Blender 3D that helps create commonly used object for architectural visualization. Retopology/Remesh: retopoflow : A suite of retopology tools for Blender. InstantMeshesRemesh : A suite of retopology tools for Blender. SpeedRetopo : is a free add-on for Blender to make fast and easy retopology using Bsurface. Retopo MT : is a tool for retopo, you use it in addition with other addons or tools in Blender, in Edit Mode. Hard Surface: KIT OPS : Can create objects and scenes with extreme efficiency and speed. Complex industrial designs can be generated in a single sitting. ND : is a free non-destructive & interactive hard surface toolkit (smart modifiers, booleans, and geometry management) HardOps/Boxcutter [$] : HardOps , is intended to be a workflow assistant toolkit. Boxcutter , the most powerful boolean subsystem for blender. Speedflow [$] : Addon for non-destructive workflow. Bevel After Boolean : Addon comes in handy when working with booleans that have a curved surface. EdgeFlow : This addon adds two operators to blender which both work on edgeloop selections. Engraver : is an Blender addon with set of few tools designed to help carving decals in 3d models. JMesh Tools : Hardsurface utility Blender addon for fast boolean and bevel operations. Offset Edges : this addon introduces a cad-like feature, which create edges that have consistent distance from original selected ones. Mesh Utils : Overlapping vert/edge/face, interior faces, edges by trait, and other stuff. Poly Source : is designed to simplify the control of the number of different types of polygons. You can see how many Gone, Quad and Tris are on the active object. Sculpt: Blender-Sculpt-Tools : Addon for help sculpting base mesh like Zbrush with Zsphere. Sculpt Alphas Manager : This addon provides a simple solution to be able to quickly switch alpha textures for the sculpt brushes. Speedsculpt [$] : The addon allows you to create very fast characters, to manage Dyntopo Sculpting with booleans, cut curves, skin modifier, decimate, mask etc. GoB : GoZ-alike tools for simple ZBrush-Blender interchange. Brush Manager for Blender : is an add-on for Blender that helps you to create custom brushes, store them in a file and organize the library of various categories of brushes. Snapping-Align: Mesh Align Plus : Precisely align, move, and measure+match objects and mesh parts in your 3D scenes. Easy Align : Easy Align addon allows you to align mesh objects origins and align mesh objects to each others easily, it works in both Edit mode and Object mode. Blign : is an alignment and distribution tool for Blender. It allows users to align and distribute shapes with many different options. Mesh Generate/Stylization: Tissue : Add-on for computational design. Mech/Fy A procedural workflow that automates the process of hard surfaces modelling. RandoMesh : A blender addon to add randomized geometry to any mesh. SliceMesh : Simple script for Blender to automate mesh slicing. SuperPoke : Iterative poking tool for Blender. MegaGrid : Simple Python script to randomly spam subdivisions. BY-GEN : is an addon designed to simplify the process of creating non-destructive, generative modeling styles in Blender. Fiber Mesh : Generate fiber meshes. Laser Slicer : Cuts up a Blender object and exports the slices to SVG files for cutting on a laser cutter or other post-processing. 🌠Animation ^ Animation Nodes : A node based visual scripting system designed for motion graphics in Blender. AnimAide : is a free add-on for Blender that has some helpful tools for animation. Commotion : Blender add-on for motion graphics. Animax [$] : is a procedural animation system for Blender. Useful for animating multiple objects. AutoMask : A Blender Add-on for automatic rotoscoping with the help of Machine Learning. COA Tools : is a 2D Animation Suite for blender. It offers a 2D cutout animation workflow similar to programs like spine or spriter. reflow : Blender addon to change fps. Keyframe Nudge : Scripts for quick keyframe manipulation. Shape Keys+ : adds a panel with extra options for creating, sorting, viewing, and driving shape keys. Stop-Mo : transforms animations into a beautiful, hand-crafted stop motion style. Blender NLA Midi Copier : Blender add-on for creating midi-driven animations from the Nonlinear Animation view. BlendyPose : Blender Motion Capture using your camera. Rigging: BlenRig : BlenRig is an Auto-rigging and skinning system. It provides the user with a Feature Film quality rig; including an advanced facial system. Rig on the Fly : Rig on the Fly is a Blender dynamic rigging tool used to simplify and speed up animation workflow. Auto-Rig Pro [$] : Auto-Rig Pro is an addon for Blender to rig characters, retarget animations, and provide Fbx export, with presets for Unity and Unreal Engine. Universal Human Rigged Base Mesh [$] : Rigged human base mesh. Mixamo add-on for Blender by Adobe : This Blender auto control-rig add-on works with characters that have been auto-rigged with the Mixamo service. Rigacar : Generate a complete rig as quickly as possible for standard car models. Wiggle Bones : Jiggle bone implementation for Blender with realistic physics. Spring Bones : Blender addon to add spring/bouncy dynamic effect to bones. Rigid Body Bones : Blender addon which adds rigid body / spring physics to bones. Bone Widget : Blender addon to assist with making custom bone shapes. Writing/Counting: WritingAnimation : This add-on generates writing animation for the selected Bezier curves in blender. Typewriter : Typewriter text animation for font objects. TextCounter : LeoMoon TextCounter is an easy to use text animation plugin for Blender that can be used to make GUI simulations. GreaseWriter : A Blender Add-on for auto-animating grease pencil strokes and emulating hand-drawn text. 🗜Render Engine ^ AMD Radeon ProRender : is AMD’s powerful physically-based rendering engine that lets creative professionals use open industry standards to leverage GPU and CPU performance to produce stunningly photorealistic images in Blender. AMD Blender USD Hydra : With Pixar's USD system emerging as a powerful tool for 3D graphics pipelines and interchange, this addon is meant to add first class support for USD and the USD Hydra rendering system to Blender. DreamWork's MoonRay : MoonRay is a physically based path-tracing renderer; it includes a USD Hydra render delegate, multi-machine and cloud rendering via the Arras distributed computation framework. Pixar's RenderMan : Physically-based render from Pixar. [more info] OctaneRender Prime for Blender : Fully integrated Octane Render, free tier. (blender plugin manual) Redshift Blender Integration [$] : Redshift by Maxon is a GPU-accelerated renderer built to meet the specific demands of contemporary high-end production rendering. LuxCore : LuxCoreRender is a physically based and unbiased rendering engine. It offers advanced features like accelerated rendering of indirect light and efficient rendering of caustics. (blender addon) Malt : Malt is a non photorealistic rendering (NPR) framework. It offers fully customizable real-time rendering framework for animation and illustration. Pixel Art Rendering : This is a free addon to make pixel art like renders in blender. It works with eevee, bayer dithering and multiple light sources. Mitsuba Renderer : Mitsuba 3 is a research-oriented retargetable rendering system for forward and inverse light transport simulation. (blender addon) appleseed : is an open source, physically-based global illumination rendering engine primarily designed for animation and visual effects. (blender addon) E-Cycles [$] : is a fork of Cycles which renders up to 2.5x faster out of the box when using CUDA GPUs, up to 15x using new options. K-Cycles [$] : Another fork of Cycles like E-Cycles. Advertised as an improvement over E-Cycles. 🗺️Texture/UV ^ UV-Packer : Automatic and free UV-Packer Add-on for Blender. DreamUV : is a collection of tools that allow you to manipulate UVs in the 3D viewport. TexTools : TexTools is a Free addon for Blender 3D with a set of professional UV and Texturing tools. Poliigon Uber Mapping Node : Anti-tile node setup for blender. [more info] Parallax Mapping : This is Parallax Mapping material and node setup. Created in Blender 2.8 for eevee renderer, it works well in cycles too. [more info] Texel Density Checker : Tools for calculate, set and copy texel density. UV Toolkit : Tools collection for UV editing in blender. Magic-UV : This is a blender add-on Magic UV consisted of many UV manipulation features which Blender lack of. EasyBake : Texture baking UI for Blender that lives in the 3D Viewport. Small but powerful! Fast one-click baking and iteration. Principled-Baker : Bake PBR textures with a few clicks. Blender Addon PBR : Provides a material panel that creates Metallic/Roughness or Specular/Gloss Nodes using the Principled BSDF shader. PBR Texture Mapper : Create PBR node setup with one click. Poliigon Material Converter : Create PBR node setup. SCATTr : Procedural texture placement. Vertex Oven : Bake game-ready ambient occlusion in seconds without UV unwrapping or agonizingly slow Cycles bakes. Bake Wrangler : is a nodes based extension and replacement for the inbuilt baking system. 3D-Coat Applink : 3DCoat now has native support of Blender via built-in AppLink. Lily Surface Scrapper : Import shaders in Blender from a single URL. glslTexture : Create textures from Glsl fragment shaders. Bake to Vertex Color : Transfer Image to selected Vertex Color in all selected Objects. EZ Baker : An easier alternative to blender's default bake system. Bystedts Blender Baker : This addon streamlines the texture baking process in Blender. Flow Map Painter : This blender add-on provides a brush tool for flow map painting. Grungit : Grungit is an addon that automatically and effortlessly adds wear and tear to your models with a single click. The result is fully controllable and can deliver anything from imperfections and light wear to heavy damage. Layer Painter : allows you to use a Layer-System for creating materials with painting and procedurals. The layers include masks, filters and much more. Even though the addon is designed with a PBR workflow in mind, you can also use it for stylized painting. Sanctus Library [$] : The ever-growing procedural material library for Blender. 🎮GameDev ^ MeshSync : Live link plugin for Unity. supported blender and other 3d softwares. Blender Tools by Epic Games : Blender addons that improve the game development workflow between Blender and Unreal. Send to Unreal, UE to Rigify. Mr Mannequins Tools : is a Blender add-on that gives the ability to export animations and weighted meshes that are directly compatible with the third person mannequin without re-targeting anything in Unreal Engine! Blender For Unreal Engine : This Add-on allows you to export content created with Blender to Unreal Engine 4. AssetGen : is automates the tasks to get a game assets ready for video games from an High Poly model. V-HACD : Library decomposes a 3D surface into a set of near convex parts. Godot Game Tools : Made easy importing mixamo animations. tools to ease the creation/import process of assets into Godot Game Engine and others. Blender2Godot : is a addon that exports a Blender scene to a Godot Engine project. Embark Blender Tools : A Blender add-on containing workflow tools for game development. Includes tools for standardized import/export workflow, 3D modelling and new object types. [medium] Asset Creation Toolset : Asset Creation Toolset is many tools for game asset creation. Mixamo Converter : is a Blender Plugin that Converts Mixamo animations to work in Unreal Engine 4 with root motion. WoT Tank Viewer : is a package of plugins for Blender, which allows you view 3D models from World of Tanks. Game Engine: Armory3D : is an open-source 3D game engine with full Blender integration. UPBGE : is an open-source 3D game engine forked from old Blender Game Engine, deployed with Blender itself. Arsenal : is a Blender integrated game engine written in Rust. INOX : Rust Game engine integrated in Blender. 🪀Misc ^ Management: BlenderKit : Allows you to download assets, materials, and alpha brushes to your blender client with the click of a button. Blender Interplanety Storage : The online material (shader) storage add-on for Blender 3D creation. With the BIS add-on, you can save materials (groups of nodes) to the online personal library and then convenient search and upload them. Asset Wizard : is a asset management addon. NodeCustomBuilder : Preset system for nodes. FontSelector : Easy font management inside Blender. Shot Manager by Ubisoft : is a add-on that introduces a true shot entity in Blender scenes. Lighting/HDRI: Gaffer : is a Blender add-on that helps you light your scenes by presenting all the right settings in convenient panels for quick access and experimentation. Extra Lights : is a plugin for Blender that adds physically based, photometric lighting presets to the Add menu. HDRI Sun Aligner : HDRI Sun Aligner is a Blender addon for automatically rotating an object (e.g. a sun) to match the brightest point in a HDRI environment texture. LeoMoon LightStudio : Lighting system for Blender. Physical Starlight and Atmosphere [$] : is a full environmental simulator that takes inspiration of 'sandbox' game worlds and editors, bringing visual consistency between every object in the scene. Free Sky Environment Shading : free custom procedural environment shading. Lumiere : Interactive Lighting add-on for Blender. Geographic/Maps: BlenderGIS : Blender addons to make the bridge between Blender and geographic data. Maps Models Importer : A Blender add-on to import models from Google Maps . [more info] blender-osm : One click download and import of OpenStreetMap and terrain for Blender. VR/AR: blender-xr : A free virtual and mixed reality user interface for Blender that enables artists to edit scenes within the software using a suitable headset and controllers. AI-Powered ^ Gigapixel AI [$] : is the only photo enlargement product available that can actually add detail back to your upscaled photo. waifu2x : Single-Image Super-Resolution for Anime-Style Art using Deep Convolutional Neural Networks. And it supports photo. Let'sEnhance.io : Increase image quality and resolution. Our AI-based editing process automatically enhance any flaw in your image. Dain-App : Dain -App is a free app that let you take any form of media like movies, stop-motion, anime, cartoons, sprites, etc and interpolate new frames, generating a bigger frame-rate from the original file. 3D Photo Inpainting : 3D Photography using Context-aware Layered Depth Inpainting. Infinite Nature : Perpetual view generation of natural scenes from a single image. PaintsChainer : AI-Powered automatic line drawing colorization colorization. EbSynth : Free tool for converting video footage into stylised motion paintings. PIFuHD : Multi-Level Pixel-Aligned Implicit Function for High-Resolution 3D Human Digitization. Generated.Photos : AI-generated faces. Flowframes : is a simple but powerful app that utilizes AI frameworks to interpolate videos in order to increase their framerate with little to no noticable quality loss. Cupscale : Image Upscaling GUI based on ESRGAN. Video2X : A lossless video/GIF/image upscaler achieved with waifu2x, Anime4K, SRMD and RealSR. koi : A plug-in for Krita that enables the use of AI models for img2img generation. Real-ESRGAN : aims at developing Practical Algorithms for General Image/Video Restoration. Midjourney : is an independent research lab that produces a proprietary artificial intelligence program that creates images from textual descriptions. Stable Diffusion : is a latent text-to-image diffusion model capable of generating photo-realistic images given any text input. Deforum Stable Diffusion : Animating prompts with Stable Diffusion. Rokoko Video : motion capture using your webcam or video-upload and animate in minutes. Sound/Music ^ Audacity : Free, open source, cross-platform audio software. AudioMass : Open-source web based audio and waveform editing tool. SFX Generators : rFXGen , sfxia , LabChirp , Bfxr . Painting ^ Krita : is a professional free and open source painting program. It is made by artists that want to see affordable art tools for everyone. HEAVYPAINT : is a simple app designed for graphic painting. The UI is streamlined for fluid, happy painting with as little friction as possible. 🔍Explore Blender ^ Documentation ^ 📖 User Manual | 🔗 Python API | ⚙️ Developer Wiki Developement ^ 🔌 Developer Portal | 💭 DevTalk | 💻 Developers Blog Community ^ 👨🏽‍🚀Blender.Community : is an independent community aggregator, by Blenderheads for Blenderheads. ☕Blender.Today : Community-driven Blender news, chat, and live streams! Stream playlist . 🖱️Right-Click Select : Got an idea for a feature that you think Blender absolutely must have? 👨‍🎨Blender Artists Community : Home of the Blender Community. 📰BlenderNation : daily news, art and tutorials for Blender, the open source 3D content creation suite. 💬blender.chat : official chat server for artists and developers. 🗨️discord/blender : community-managed Discord server. fb/blender : blender facebook group. blender.stackexchange.com : questions and answers. 👩🏻‍🏫Tutorials ^ ▷ video, ☰ playlist, ☷ channel, 🧾 doc. 🍩Beginning ^ ☰ Blender Fundamentals by Blender. ☰ Blender Basics by CG Cookie. ☰ 🍩Blender 3.0 Beginner Donut Tutorial by Blender Guru. ☰ 🍦Blender Complete Beginner Tutorial Course by CG Geek. ☰ 🍏Blender Beginner Tutorial Series by CG Boost. ☰ ⚔️3D Modeling a Sword for Complete Beginners by YanSculpts. ☰🪑 Beginner Modelling Chair Tutorial by Blender Guru. 🗿Modeling ^ 🧾 Modeling Manual. ▷ Blender Beginner 3D Modeling Tutorial. ☰ Beginner Exercieses - Low Poly Asset Modeling by Grant Abbitt. ▷ Recording Studio in Blender- 3D Isometric Modeling Process. ▷ All 50+ Modifiers in Blender Explained in 30 Minutes. Sculpting: ☷ YanSculpts' Channel ☷ Julien Kaspar's Channel ▷ Introduction to Sculpting in Blender - Sculpting Essentials. ▷ The Speed Sculpting Guide - Learn from Limitation. ▷ Sculpting in Blender - Beginners Detailed Guide - Every Brush. Character Modeling: ▷ Stylized Character Workflow with Blender. ▷ Modeling a character BaseMesh in Blender. Hard Surface: ☰ Hard-surface Modeling in Blender by Gleb Alexandrov. ▷ Blender Hardsurface Sculpting Tips. 🌌Geometry Nodes ^ 🧾 Geometry Nodes Manual. ☰ Geometry Nodes by Chris Prenninger . ☰ Geometry Nodes by Blue Fox . ☰ Geometry Nodes Basics for Beginners by Bradley Animation . 🔘Shader Nodes ^ 🧾 Shader Nodes List. ▷ Shading Editor Basics by Blender. ▷ Blender - Everything About The Principled BSDF (In 3 Minutes). ▷ Advanced Materials in Blender - Shader Editor Tutorial. ☰ Blender Procedural Nodes Playlist by Default Cube. ☰ Node School Playlist by Grant Abbitt. ☰ Blender Principled BSDF (Speed Tutorials) by Royal Skies LLC. ☰ Blender Procedural Texturing (Speed Tutorials) by Royal Skies LLC. ▷ All 80+ Blender material nodes explained in under 30 minutes. 🌠Animation ^ 🧾 Animation & Rigging Manual. ▷ Blender Animate Running In 2 Minutes! ▷ Rig any Character for Animation in 10 Minutes! ▷ Blender Character Animation: Shape Keys. ▷ Create Loop Animations. ☰ Blender Animation (Speed Tutorials) by Royal Skies LLC. ☰ Blender Rigging (Speed Tutorials) by Royal Skies LLC. ▷ Quick Smooth Camera Movements. 🔲UV Mapping ^ 🧾 UV Editor Manual. ▷ UV Unwrapping - Blender Fundamentals. ☰ Blender UV Mapping (Speed Tutorials) by Royal Skies LLC. 🔳Texture Painting ^ 🧾 Texture Paint Manual. ▷ Blender Beginner Texturing Painting Tutorial. ▷ Blender Texture Painting- Quick Start. ☰ Blender Texture Painting (Speed Tutorials) by Royal Skies LLC. 📐Compositing ^ 🧾 Compositing Nodes List. ▷ How to composite renders in Blender. ▷ Blender Render Passes and Very Basic Compositing. ▷ Render Passes in Blender - What are they and why even use them? ▷ How to use blender's compositor to improve a rendered frame sequence. ▷ Blender Compositor for Post Processing. 🤺Motion Tracking/Capture ^ 🧾 Motion Tracking Manual. ☰ Blender Motion Tracking Series by CGmatter. ▷ Add CGI Characters to Live Footage by CG Geek. ▷ Blender Facial motion capture tutorial. ▷ How to 3D Motion Capture Easy and Free with a Phone! ▷ Add VFX to Cinematic RAW and LOG Footage Premium Tutorials ^ Blender Cloud CG Cookie , CG Masters , CG Boost Academy , polygonrunway gumroad/blender : jamajurabaev , janurschel , yansculpts , udemy/blender : Creating 3D environments in Blender by Rob Tuytel blendermarket/training , lynda/blender , skillshare/blender Fundamentals ^ 📦 Pixar in a Box : Pixar and Khan Academy have collaborated to create, develop, and promote a series of learning tutorials that demonstrate how traditional school subjects such as math, science, and the arts are a vital part of the everyday work put into Pixar's filmmaking process. 📚Books ^ Blender For Dummies by Jason van Gumster Blender Secrets by Jan van den Hemel Blender 3D Architect by Allan Brito 👩🏽‍💻Development ^ Scripting/Developing ^ 🧾Documentation: Blender Python API Documentation : Official Blender Python API Documentation. Programming Add-ons for Blender 2.8 : It shows how to set up a professional IDE for writing Python programs for Blender, on the example of a simple plugin. It is an ebook, published freely on Creative Commons license. blenderscripting : blender related python snippets to get you started. Blender 3D: Noob to Pro/Python Scripting : Python Scripting from Blender 3D: Noob to Pro book. Video Tutorials: ☰ Scripting for Artists by Blender. ☰ Blender Programming Tutorials by Olav3D. ☰ Blender Scripting by Darkfall ▷ Blender 2.8 Addon Development Tutorial for Beginners by jayanam. ▷ Creating a Blender 2.8 Voxelize Python Script , [part2] Posts: Blender 2.8 Python Scripting Superpowers for Non-Programmers : If you’ve been using Blender or any other 3D app for a while, you’ve found yourself slogging through the same tasks over and over again and at some point thinking, “I really wish Blender just did this for me”. Through scripting, it can! Blender 2.8 Grease Pencil Scripting and Generative Art : learning the basics of scripting for Blender Grease-Pencil tool, with focus on generative art as a concrete playground. Visualizing Complex Numbers in Blender : This tutorial introduces how to make patterns with complex numbers in Blender. Sources: blender-scripting : Introduction to blender scripting. This is a collection of simple to more involved examples to scripting in Blender with Python. The Code Editor : This thread is for discussing how the Text Editor can be improved and sharing add-ons which will modernize, expand and ease coding in Blender. fake-bpy-module : is the collections of the fake Blender Python API modules for the code completion in commonly used IDEs. blender-debugger-for-vscode : Blender addon for remote debugging Blender with VS Code (and Visual Studio). Blender Development in VS Code : Visual Studio Code extension for Blender development. blender-cli-rendering : Python scripts for rendering images using Blender from command-line interface. render-useful : Command-line tools for Blender renders. textension : Productivity enhancements for Blender's text editor and autocomplete modules for Blender python API. blender-addon-tester : The blender addon tester is a test harness to enable pytest hook to allow addons to be tested inside a defined version of blender. EasyBPY : This purpose of this module is to simplify the use of the Blender API (bpy) by creating an extra layer of abstraction that is more human-readable, memorable and reduces the user's exposure to complex code paths. Advanced Blender Add-on : This repository intends to give a starter kit as well as to illustrate and intensively comment design patterns commonly used in advanced Blender add-ons. 3DN BIP : A Python library for Blender. Blazingly fast preview loads in Blender. Images of arbitrary size. bpy.utils.previews drop-in replacement. Geometry Script : is a scripting API for Blender's Geometry Nodes. It makes complicated node trees more managable and easy to share. Support: devtalk/python : Questions about using and developing the Blender Python API , both for Blender itself and add-ons. blenderartists/python-support , stackoverflow/tagged/bpy Blender Source ^ 🧾 Developer Documentation : Here you can find information about Blender's development process, design and architecture, as well as instructions for Building Blender. 🔌 Developer Portal | 💭 DevTalk | 💻 Developers Blog Learn Python ^ Awesome Python : A curated list of awesome Python frameworks, libraries, software and resources. All Algorithms implemented in Python . Learn Computer Graphics ^ Computer Graphics from scratch This book will not teach you how to use OpenGL or DirectX; instead, it can teach you how OpenGL and DirectX work. tinyraytracer : Understandable RayTracing in 256 lines of bare C++. tinyrenderer : Tiny Renderer or how OpenGL works: software rendering in 500 lines of code. Awesome Computer Graphics : A curated list of awesome stuff to learn computer graphics. awesome-graphics : Curated list of computer graphics tutorials and resources. Related Awesome Lists ^ awesome-3d-human : A curated list of papers & resources linked to 3D Human research including face, body, hand and motion modeling. awesome-3d-printing : A curated list of awesome 3D printing resources. 3D-Machine-Learning : A resource repository for 3D machine learning. Awesome Gamedev : A curated list of good stuff related to the development of games. Awesome Design Tools : The best design tools and plugins for everything. Awesome Design : Curated design resources. Awesome Stock Resources : A collection of links for free stock photography, video and Illustration websites. GameDev Resources : A wonderful list of Game Development resources. VFX Good Night Reading : Curated collection of good reading about VFX and CG. Photogrammetry Guide : A guide covering Photogrammetry including the applications, libraries and tools that will make you a better and more efficient Photogrammetry development. 🖇Social ^ 🔍Explore Artworks ^ 🐦Twitter Accounts ^ Some accounts where you can find different kinds of content related to blender. @pablodp606 , @3DBystedt , @ppaawweeuu , @mxeon1001 , @Mrdodobird , @ArtFromRachel , @wanoco4D , @dedouze_ , @AFX_LAB , @Yokohara_h , @Karl_poyzer , @Kazlyan , @arc4g , @FlipFluids , @CGGeeks , @PabloVazquez_ , @IMilk_ManI , @bluefox_3d , @LucaRood , @janurschel , @zuggamasta , @andrewpprice , @brentpatterson , @FinEskimo @VicDoval 📢Youtube Channels ^ IanHubert : Lazy tutorials , modeling, animating, vfx, cinematic. Midge Sinnaeve : modifiers, weird sh!t , art streams. CGMatter : short tutorials. Default Cube : CGMatter's second channel used for longer tutorials and other kinds of videos. SouthernShotty : stylized modeling, character creation, sculpting. Blender Guru : Most popular blender channel on youtube. CG Geek : second most popular blender channel on youtube. Gleb Alexandrov : one of the best-known blender channel on youtube. Ducky 3D : abstract designs, modifiers. Royal Skies LLC : Speed tutorials , texturing, mapping, nodes, animation. Grant Abbitt : modeling, animation, sculpting, low-poly, game assets. Chris Prenninger : animation nodes, particle systems, shading. Jayanam : Shading, coding, modeling. CG Boost : modeling, sculpting. CG Cookie : free tutorials from CG Cookie . FlippedNormals : sculpting, modeling. Curtis Holt : modeling, modifiers, coding. Polygon Runway : stylish low-poly modeling. Steven Scott : add-ons, feature reviews. Blender NPR : non-Photorealistic and expressive rendering. Martin Klekner : modeling, texturing. Danny Mac 3D : character modeling, posing, rigging, retopology, sculpting. Daniel Krafft - DSO : blender tips, add-ons. Imphenzia : low poly modeling, rigging. Saqib Hussain : modeling, modifiers, texturing, shading. CrossMind Studio : introduction, modeling, shading, lighting, modifiers. CBaileyFilm : blender animation projects. Josh Gambrell : hard surface modeling. CG Masters : modeling, texturing, shading. Peter France : modeling, texturing, shading, vfx. Polyfjord : animation. Cédric Lepiller : hard surface modeling. FlyCat : character modeling. Stylized Station : game art. Iridesium : simulation, vfx. Lightning Boy Studio : toon shader, npr. Giulia Marchetti : sculpting, character modeling. CG Fast Track : modeling, animation. 3DGreenhorn : isometric modeling. Bad Normals : modeling, animation. Kevandram : grease pencil. Noggi : sculpting. DerekElliott : modeling, animation. Samuel Sullins : Geometry Nodes, vfx, lowpoly, general. CG Python : blender Python scripting tips and tricks. 💻Blogs ^ The Blend : Weekly articles & lessons on Blender & 3D Blender Sushi : Collection of 3D ideas, poetries and experiments blended in Blender 3D. Artisticrender : Tutorials, tips, resources about Blender and 3D. Creative Shrimp : High quality CG tutorials and Blender tutorials, digital art and lighting tutorials with Gleb and Aidy. Blender 3D Architect : is the place to find news, tutorials, resources and training related to architectural visualization using Blender. BlenderAddons.org : provides a list of free and paid Blender addons. Find the addon you need under categories or tags. Interplanety : Blender tutorials, articles, tips, notes. Darkfall : Blender python tutorials, nodes. The CG Essentials : 3D modeling, rendering, animation, particle simulation, and more, this is the place to be for Blender Tutorials. Blender Secrets : is home to hundreds of one-minute or less video tutorials that teach you specific topics. 🎊Challenges ^ Nodevember : The yearly event for everything procedural. Feel like doing a challenge? #nodevember is all about creating and promoting procedural awesomeness! A whole month to improve and show off your procedural skills. See works: tw/#nodevember , ig/#nodevember , artstation/nodevember SculptJanuary : Challenge yourself over 31 days with a set of 31 topics. Sculpt every day and improve your sculpting skills. See works: tw/#sculptjanuary , ig/#sculptjanuary , artstation/sculptjanuary 36 Days of Type : is a yearly open call inviting designers, illustrators and visual artists to share their view on the letters and numbers from our alphabet. See works: tw/#36daysoftype , ig/#36daysoftype , artstation/36daysoftype Competitions: /r/blender: contest , blenderartists.org/contest . Render Challenge : The most up-to-date database of 3D art challenges on the Internet! Get notified of new render challenges every Friday. pwnisher : Clinton Jones' Youtube channel regularly organizes 3D Challanges. 🎉Events ^ Blender Conference : The yearly Blender Conference in Amsterdam. (Playlists: Bcon22 , Bcon20 , Bcon19 , Bcon18 , Bcon17 ). Symbols ^ [$] paid ones, repo link, blender market, 🧾 doc. Video Symbols: ▷ video, ☰ playlist, ☷ channel. Please read the contributing guidelines first, some sections have their own guidelines as a comment line. Thanks for reading!

docs.text: Check list of Blender's built-in add-ons documentation here .
docs.title: 🔮Add-ons ^

docs.text: FLIP Fluids : is a powerful liquid simulation plugin that gives you the ability to create high quality fluid effects all within Blender, the free and open source 3D creation suite. Molecular Script : is a particle collision addon that makes particles collide for creating certain types of simulations, effects and particles linking as well. Jet-Fluids : Jet fluid simulator integration in blender. projectile : An artist-friendly tool for throwing stuff around inside blender. Phobos : An add-on for Blender allowing to create URDF, SDF and SMURF robot models.
docs.title: 🌊Simulation/Physics ^

docs.text: CharMorph : is an open source character creation tool for Blender. It's a rewrite of MB-Lab , which is now unmaintained. MPFB : MPFB2 is an open source human generator for Blender. It's complete rewrite of MakeHuman as a Blender addon. FaceBuilder [$] : is a Blender add-on that lets you create photorealistic 3D models of human faces and heads using a few photographs with a neutral face expression. [medium] Tiny Eye : Tiny Eye is a FREE, fully procedural, stylised eye that works in Eevee and Cycles. Wolf Generators : a pack of 16 geometry nodes generators, including Bridge, Cables, Chain, Falling Particles, Lightning, Music Visualizer, Rope, Snow, Snow Flake, Spider Web. Buildify : is a geometry nodes library for easy building creation. Bricker [$] : Photoreal Lego/Minecraft Simulations. Blender Data Visualisation : Load data into Blender and create visualisations. BookGen : is a free book-generation addon for Blender. Celtic Knot : Generate bezier curves, pipes and ribbons in elaborate weavings, based off of a framework mesh. Data-FX : Loads and visualizes different types of data within Blender from .csv files. Electric Line Generator : is an addon for blender which helps generating complex Electric power Line. Geometry Nodes Demo : Free examples of geometry nodes including procedural buildings and a hex grid map. Geometry Nodes Pipes : is an addon for blender which helps generating complex pipe layouts. HGen : Blender hair generation and manipulating tool. Industrial Geonodes : A collection of industrial themed Geometry nodes. Includes; Pipes, Vents and Catwalks. Mesh Maze : Blender add-on to generate a maze on any mesh. Modular Tree : This addon for blender allows the creation of realistic trees with the node editor. Post USSR Builder : Simple post USSR style building generator on geometry nodes. 2.93 and newer. Procedural Snow Shader : Procedural snow shader created in Blender. Procedural Slime : generates procedural slime between objects. Random Book Generator : Book randomizing asset for Blender. Made with the new Geometry nodes. Real Sky : This add-on can generate procedural clouds, which Blender's built-in Dynamic Sky add-on lacks. SpaceshipGenerator : procedurally generate 3D spaceships. Space Station Generator : Tool lets you generate sprawling space stations. Sprytile : a blender add-on for building tile based low-poly scenes with paint/map editor like tools. [more info] Stylized Fantasy Tree Generator : Generate endless variations of stylized trees with this geometry nodes tool. tree-gen : procedural generation of tree models in blender. Tyre Generator : Free tyre generator with geometry nodes. Welder : welds generator for Blender. Environment: Infinigen : Infinigen is a procedural generator of 3D scenes. It can generate infinite Photorealistic Worlds using real geometry. Infinigen is optimized for computer vision research and generates diverse high-quality 3D training data. Graswald [$] : is the solution for 3D Artists who need realistic vegetation in their scenes. SceneCity [$] : Generate large road networks and mass-place tens of thousands of buildings. Mix both procedural and hand-made assets. The Grove 3D [$] : Grow natural 3D trees for visualisation and film. Grow, bend, prune, interactively simulate the seasons year by year. Scatter: Geo-Scatter [$] : The scattering tool for blender. BagaPie Modifier : This addon create modifier and geometry nodes preset like: boolean, scatter, auto array on curve. Gscatter : Artist-friendly scattering for free from developers of Grasswald. City Scatter : Generate cityscape concepts, powered by Blender's collection system.
docs.title: 🦑Generator/Builder ^

docs.text: MACHIN3tools : is a free, continuously evolving collection of blender tools and pie menus in a single customizable package. QBlocker : is an interactive object creation tool for Blender. fspy : is an open-source camera matching app, extremely useful for modeling directly from a reference image. (blender addon) PolyQuilt : is provides a few functions in edit mode like creating faces, knife tool, fan, edge-loops, etc. It does this with only the left-mouse-button. So no menu’s, no shortcuts. [more info] Modeling Cloth : Create real-time cloth-like behavior in meshes in Blender. KeKit : Brings some much needed functionality to Blender, with a whole array of production tools. Array Tools : is an addon for Blender to create translation, scale, rotation array with offset or global parameters in any direction and mix them. BezierUtility : This add-on contains several tools for working with Bezier curves. Mesh Heal : is an add-on for Blender, it includes additional Blender operators for healing surface meshes. JewelCraft : jewelry design toolkit add-on for Blender. Box Select X-Ray : Modified box select tool that automatically toggles x-ray mode on and off during selection. Polysweeper : is a tool to sweep a face profile along a face loop. Edit Split Normals : Edit normals like meshes. Auto Mirror : Automate a series of tasks, such as deleting a half, setting a mirror modifier, setting a clipping, etc. Drop It : Designed to drop fast and simply Objects to Ground or Surface. Maxivz’s Interactive Tools : Collection of intuitive, context sensitive tools for Blender. Synced Modifiers : allows you to add modifiers to multiple objects at the same time and automatically syncs all the modifiers using Drivers. CAD: BlenderBIM : An add-on for beautiful, detailed, and data-rich OpenBIM with Blender. Archipack [$] : The Archipack addon for Blender contains a collection of parametric primitives for ArchViz. You can manipulate these primitives with a realtime on-screen editing interface. Building Tools : Building generation addon for blender. Sverchok : is a powerful parametric tool for architects, allowing geometry to be programmed visually with nodes. CAD Sketcher : CAD Sketcher is a free and open-source project looking to enhance precision workflows in blender by bringing CAD like tools, features and usability. CAD Transform : CAD Transform provide intuitive snap from/to workflow, allow precise move/rotate/scale using advanced snap options and constraints in both object and edit mode. MeasureIt-ARCH : An expansion of Antonio Vazquez's MeasureIt addon to add features to create Architectural Drawings. JARCH-Vis : is add-on for Blender 3D that helps create commonly used object for architectural visualization. Retopology/Remesh: retopoflow : A suite of retopology tools for Blender. InstantMeshesRemesh : A suite of retopology tools for Blender. SpeedRetopo : is a free add-on for Blender to make fast and easy retopology using Bsurface. Retopo MT : is a tool for retopo, you use it in addition with other addons or tools in Blender, in Edit Mode. Hard Surface: KIT OPS : Can create objects and scenes with extreme efficiency and speed. Complex industrial designs can be generated in a single sitting. ND : is a free non-destructive & interactive hard surface toolkit (smart modifiers, booleans, and geometry management) HardOps/Boxcutter [$] : HardOps , is intended to be a workflow assistant toolkit. Boxcutter , the most powerful boolean subsystem for blender. Speedflow [$] : Addon for non-destructive workflow. Bevel After Boolean : Addon comes in handy when working with booleans that have a curved surface. EdgeFlow : This addon adds two operators to blender which both work on edgeloop selections. Engraver : is an Blender addon with set of few tools designed to help carving decals in 3d models. JMesh Tools : Hardsurface utility Blender addon for fast boolean and bevel operations. Offset Edges : this addon introduces a cad-like feature, which create edges that have consistent distance from original selected ones. Mesh Utils : Overlapping vert/edge/face, interior faces, edges by trait, and other stuff. Poly Source : is designed to simplify the control of the number of different types of polygons. You can see how many Gone, Quad and Tris are on the active object. Sculpt: Blender-Sculpt-Tools : Addon for help sculpting base mesh like Zbrush with Zsphere. Sculpt Alphas Manager : This addon provides a simple solution to be able to quickly switch alpha textures for the sculpt brushes. Speedsculpt [$] : The addon allows you to create very fast characters, to manage Dyntopo Sculpting with booleans, cut curves, skin modifier, decimate, mask etc. GoB : GoZ-alike tools for simple ZBrush-Blender interchange. Brush Manager for Blender : is an add-on for Blender that helps you to create custom brushes, store them in a file and organize the library of various categories of brushes. Snapping-Align: Mesh Align Plus : Precisely align, move, and measure+match objects and mesh parts in your 3D scenes. Easy Align : Easy Align addon allows you to align mesh objects origins and align mesh objects to each others easily, it works in both Edit mode and Object mode. Blign : is an alignment and distribution tool for Blender. It allows users to align and distribute shapes with many different options. Mesh Generate/Stylization: Tissue : Add-on for computational design. Mech/Fy A procedural workflow that automates the process of hard surfaces modelling. RandoMesh : A blender addon to add randomized geometry to any mesh. SliceMesh : Simple script for Blender to automate mesh slicing. SuperPoke : Iterative poking tool for Blender. MegaGrid : Simple Python script to randomly spam subdivisions. BY-GEN : is an addon designed to simplify the process of creating non-destructive, generative modeling styles in Blender. Fiber Mesh : Generate fiber meshes. Laser Slicer : Cuts up a Blender object and exports the slices to SVG files for cutting on a laser cutter or other post-processing.
docs.title: 🧊Modeling ^

docs.text: Animation Nodes : A node based visual scripting system designed for motion graphics in Blender. AnimAide : is a free add-on for Blender that has some helpful tools for animation. Commotion : Blender add-on for motion graphics. Animax [$] : is a procedural animation system for Blender. Useful for animating multiple objects. AutoMask : A Blender Add-on for automatic rotoscoping with the help of Machine Learning. COA Tools : is a 2D Animation Suite for blender. It offers a 2D cutout animation workflow similar to programs like spine or spriter. reflow : Blender addon to change fps. Keyframe Nudge : Scripts for quick keyframe manipulation. Shape Keys+ : adds a panel with extra options for creating, sorting, viewing, and driving shape keys. Stop-Mo : transforms animations into a beautiful, hand-crafted stop motion style. Blender NLA Midi Copier : Blender add-on for creating midi-driven animations from the Nonlinear Animation view. BlendyPose : Blender Motion Capture using your camera. Rigging: BlenRig : BlenRig is an Auto-rigging and skinning system. It provides the user with a Feature Film quality rig; including an advanced facial system. Rig on the Fly : Rig on the Fly is a Blender dynamic rigging tool used to simplify and speed up animation workflow. Auto-Rig Pro [$] : Auto-Rig Pro is an addon for Blender to rig characters, retarget animations, and provide Fbx export, with presets for Unity and Unreal Engine. Universal Human Rigged Base Mesh [$] : Rigged human base mesh. Mixamo add-on for Blender by Adobe : This Blender auto control-rig add-on works with characters that have been auto-rigged with the Mixamo service. Rigacar : Generate a complete rig as quickly as possible for standard car models. Wiggle Bones : Jiggle bone implementation for Blender with realistic physics. Spring Bones : Blender addon to add spring/bouncy dynamic effect to bones. Rigid Body Bones : Blender addon which adds rigid body / spring physics to bones. Bone Widget : Blender addon to assist with making custom bone shapes. Writing/Counting: WritingAnimation : This add-on generates writing animation for the selected Bezier curves in blender. Typewriter : Typewriter text animation for font objects. TextCounter : LeoMoon TextCounter is an easy to use text animation plugin for Blender that can be used to make GUI simulations. GreaseWriter : A Blender Add-on for auto-animating grease pencil strokes and emulating hand-drawn text.
docs.title: 🌠Animation ^

docs.text: AMD Radeon ProRender : is AMD’s powerful physically-based rendering engine that lets creative professionals use open industry standards to leverage GPU and CPU performance to produce stunningly photorealistic images in Blender. AMD Blender USD Hydra : With Pixar's USD system emerging as a powerful tool for 3D graphics pipelines and interchange, this addon is meant to add first class support for USD and the USD Hydra rendering system to Blender. DreamWork's MoonRay : MoonRay is a physically based path-tracing renderer; it includes a USD Hydra render delegate, multi-machine and cloud rendering via the Arras distributed computation framework. Pixar's RenderMan : Physically-based render from Pixar. [more info] OctaneRender Prime for Blender : Fully integrated Octane Render, free tier. (blender plugin manual) Redshift Blender Integration [$] : Redshift by Maxon is a GPU-accelerated renderer built to meet the specific demands of contemporary high-end production rendering. LuxCore : LuxCoreRender is a physically based and unbiased rendering engine. It offers advanced features like accelerated rendering of indirect light and efficient rendering of caustics. (blender addon) Malt : Malt is a non photorealistic rendering (NPR) framework. It offers fully customizable real-time rendering framework for animation and illustration. Pixel Art Rendering : This is a free addon to make pixel art like renders in blender. It works with eevee, bayer dithering and multiple light sources. Mitsuba Renderer : Mitsuba 3 is a research-oriented retargetable rendering system for forward and inverse light transport simulation. (blender addon) appleseed : is an open source, physically-based global illumination rendering engine primarily designed for animation and visual effects. (blender addon) E-Cycles [$] : is a fork of Cycles which renders up to 2.5x faster out of the box when using CUDA GPUs, up to 15x using new options. K-Cycles [$] : Another fork of Cycles like E-Cycles. Advertised as an improvement over E-Cycles.

docs.text: UV-Packer : Automatic and free UV-Packer Add-on for Blender. DreamUV : is a collection of tools that allow you to manipulate UVs in the 3D viewport. [more info] Parallax Mapping : This is Parallax Mapping material and node setup. Created in Blender 2.8 for eevee renderer, it works well in cycles too. [more info] Texel Density Checker : Tools for calculate, set and copy texel density. UV Toolkit : Tools collection for UV editing in blender. Magic-UV : This is a blender add-on Magic UV consisted of many UV manipulation features which Blender lack of. EasyBake : Texture baking UI for Blender that lives in the 3D Viewport. Small but powerful! Fast one-click baking and iteration. Principled-Baker : Bake PBR textures with a few clicks. Blender Addon PBR : Provides a material panel that creates Metallic/Roughness or Specular/Gloss Nodes using the Principled BSDF shader. PBR Texture Mapper : Create PBR node setup with one click. Poliigon Material Converter : Create PBR node setup. SCATTr : Procedural texture placement. Vertex Oven : Bake game-ready ambient occlusion in seconds without UV unwrapping or agonizingly slow Cycles bakes. Bake Wrangler : is a nodes based extension and replacement for the inbuilt baking system. 3D-Coat Applink : 3DCoat now has native support of Blender via built-in AppLink. Lily Surface Scrapper : Import shaders in Blender from a single URL. glslTexture : Create textures from Glsl fragment shaders. Bake to Vertex Color : Transfer Image to selected Vertex Color in all selected Objects. EZ Baker : An easier alternative to blender's default bake system. Bystedts Blender Baker : This addon streamlines the texture baking process in Blender. Flow Map Painter : This blender add-on provides a brush tool for flow map painting. Grungit : Grungit is an addon that automatically and effortlessly adds wear and tear to your models with a single click. The result is fully controllable and can deliver anything from imperfections and light wear to heavy damage. Layer Painter : allows you to use a Layer-System for creating materials with painting and procedurals. The layers include masks, filters and much more. Even though the addon is designed with a PBR workflow in mind, you can also use it for stylized painting. Sanctus Library [$] : The ever-growing procedural material library for Blender.

AStats : Show Stats in Viewport. VideoEditor: Power Sequencer : Brings smart new editing features to edit faster with Blender's Video Sequence Editor. It is completely Free and Open Source. VSEQF : is an overhaul for Blender's VSE that can completely change your workflow. Designed for quick, mouse and keyboard balanced editing with a focus on real-time feedback. Transform Tools : Quickly transform, crop and fade video strips in Blender's Video Sequence Editor. Easy Proxy : Blender addon to create proxy files for Video Sequence Editor (VSE) easily using FFMPEG. Parallel_Render : Render the output from the Sequencer multithreaded through the Render siderbar. Export EDL : Exports: video, audio and dissolves. to ex. Davinci Resolve, Lightworks, Final Cut Pro & Premiere Pro. Import EDL : Imports: video, audio and dissolves. Freesound Add-on : is an addon for Blender that allows users to create and edit subtitles for movies or music. Push to Talk : Convenient recording of scratch dialog for an edit. Scene Strip Tools : Preview Scene Strips directly in the 3D View. Subsimport : is an addon for Blender that allows users to create and edit subtitles for movies or music. TextEditor: TexTension : For increasing productivity and generally trying to match the writing experience of a modern text editor. Code Editor : Adds minimap, text tabs, whitespace markers and indent guides. Run in Console : Execute a text block and catch its output (prints and errors) in Blender's interactive console. Snippets Library : Allow you use and manage a library of your own and existing code snippets. Search Online References : Search current text in API Reference, Python Reference, Blender Stack Exchange, Blender Source Code and Github. Run PEP8 Check : Check current script for pep8 mistakes. Formatting : Trim whitespace change case and split and join lines. Insert and Navigate to Text Markers : Insert and navigate to text marker positions. Autocomplete/Intellisense : Autocomplete/Intellisense for the Text Editor. Photogrammetry: Photogrammetry Importer : Addon to import different photogrammetry formats into Blender. blender_kitti : Render large point clouds and voxel grids with blender. Point Cloud Visualizer : Display, edit, filter, render, convert, generate and export colored point cloud PLY files. EEVEE: Glass for EEVEE : This shader allows you to make realistic glass with eevee. SSGI for EEVEE : Converts Diffuse and Principled BSDFs to nodegroups that give representation of diffuse component to SSR for SSGI effect. Shader Displacement for Eevee : Using a few modifiers and a nodegroup, realtime shader displacement in Eevee is now possible. Eevee Presets : Save Eevee Presets. Projectors : A blender add-on for simple projector creation and modification. Simple Renaming Panel : Rename more objects at once. The tool includes basic functionalities of adding suffixes, prefixes, search and replace, add suffixes depending on the object type and much more. IOR Reference : A blender addon that display IOR values in a list. QuickSwitch : A helper to quick switch workspaces and view render menu in viewport. ProSidebar : Add additional properties and operators to the 3D View Sidebar. Tilecam : Render seamlessly repeatable images. Fbx Format Converter : This project allows you to convert binary fbx files to asciis and vice versa. Set Viewport Color : Blender Script to Set the Viewport Color based on a nodetree. PresetterProfessional : View and visibility presets, 3d cursor presets, snap presets, etc. presets. PowerSave : is a tool intended to streamline saving and make saving itself more accessible, friendly and more artist streamlined. Lodify : LOD(Level of Detail) and Proxy system for blender. Multi-user : Enable real-time collaborative workflows inside blender. Screenwriter : Write screenplays in Blender Text Editor in Fountain markup syntax view/export with correct screenplay formatting. VoxelDraw : An addon to draw voxel meshes in edit mode for Blender. Spread Objects : Spread the selected objects on an evenly spaced grid. Mixer by Ubisoft : is a Blender addon developed at Ubisoft Animation Studio for Real Time Collaboration in 3D edition.
